articles.title: La Puerta Roja: New Joint Venture From Machaco, Aramos
articles.description: Argentina’s Machaco Films and Aramos Cine launch joint venture label La Puerta Roja.
articles.content: Fernando Díaz’s Machaco Films and Roxana Ramos’ Aramos Cine have partnered to set up a joint venture: La Puerta Roja, focused on horror and fantasy movies as well as working with prominent genre directors from Ibero-America. Both companies are based ... [2929 chars]

articles.title: Crop concerns in southern Brazil and Argentina
articles.description: Drier than normal conditions are expected to continue across southern Brazil and Argentina, a typical La Niña precipitation pattern for South America.
articles.content:
The dry conditions will threaten early-planted crops with some yield loss concerns.
Most of the soybeans are in the ground across Brazil and soil moisture will need to be replenished to aid in germination.
As we flip the calendar to December 2021, a ... [1885 chars]

articles.title: Argentina Squeezes Foreign Travel To Protect Its Dollars
articles.description: Argentina's government launched measures on Friday to discourage foreign travel as a way to protect the country's thin dollar reserves ahead of heavy debt payments.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina: Argentina’s government launched measures on Friday to discourage foreign travel as a way to protect the country’s thin dollar reserves ahead of heavy debt payments.

articles.title: Argentine movement tries to make Black heritage more visible
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — It wasn’t until Julia Cohen Ribeiro moved to Argentina that she discovered she was Black. Her hair was curly, but her skin was light. She had never identified as anything other than Brazilian in her country of birth.
